item.title: Leaving Cruise; why I'm still excited about AI platforms
item.description: Today marks a bittersweet moment as I say goodbye to Cruise. When I joined the company seven months ago, my mission was to scale the AV services worldwide and to modernize the AV and Cloud service developer platforms. Despite the unexpected challenges following the October incident, my journey at Cruise has been incredibly enriching, teaching me the true essence of resilience, adaptability, and commitment to excellence.
